title: Bugsplat whenever trying to connect
body:
My launcher is perfectly fine, it launches fine, it logs in fine and can access stores perfectly fine. 
HOWEVER...
It won't let me join a game. It'll search, find a match, lock in, etc. But,
when it starts, the loading screen won't load and will come up with "Your game has crashed, please reconnect"
And when you try to reconnect you get bugsplat. Yup.
1000000 times, Riot. 1000000 times I have reconnected. And I'm sorta getting sick of that bugsplat you know... 
just saying...
just like if you ever wanna know...
I prefer league of legends over bugsplat on my screen...
I've sent in error reports and everything ;-; I've done everything on the forums but like, 
ITS NOT WORKING QWQ   {{item:3070}}
